summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to City employment, to be known as the Fourth Quarter 2002 Salary Ordinance, establishing new titles and/or salaries in various departments; designating two positions as exempt from civil service status in the Police Department and the Seattle Public Utilities Department; amending the wage rate of previously legislated new titles; all by a 2/3 vote of the City Council.
note: Fourth Quarter 2002 Salary Ordinance, 4th Quarter 2002 Salary Ordinance
